website_summaries.verdict: An reasonably priced miter saw that is suitable for hobbyists and DIY projects.
pros: Easy to move around a workshop
Users say it's not extremely loud
cons: Some owners complain that the teeth are too far apart for precise cuts on some materials
Some parts, such as the control arm, feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: this is a fine saw that is light and works well with the ...
customer_reviews.text: As a professional shower door installer, this is a fine saw that is light and works well with the exception of when it comes to locking in the angle needed. All other saws I have used over the last 28 years have a locking mechanism that allows you to instantly find the 45*, 22.5* and 0*. This saw slides right by those if you are not watching what you're doing. Very frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Good saw for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great saw! Only slight worry is the accuracy of the swivel... It's a plastic knob and for me; if I tighten it good, I feel like I'm about to break it.. Sometimes the angle pivot comes lose and if I don't notice, it will cut slightly beveled! - Maybe user-fault, but if it was a locking latch style it wouldn't be an issue! Other than that, it's light and does everything I need it to with what I think is a reasonable price. Never used the laser that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach.H

customer_reviews.title: Best money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I had many baseboards to install, the machine is precise enough for such job. I can relate to some reviews pointing out the fact the angles are not precisely enough identified but it is good enough for general work. I found the laser too weak and difficult to properly center. I decided not to use it at all and always check with the blade itself the proper position (very successfully) The rest of the machine is of very good quality and worth any dime.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Within a year the laser has become unstable and unreliable-unable to secure it. The back rail is also warped and making a 0 cut from the left requires you set the blade at -1 while from the right requires a +3 degrees. Impossible to do the simplest jobs. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Cinobey6

customer_reviews.title: Faulty laser
customer_reviews.text: Saw itself is fine, laser full 2 degrees off. Why pay extra for laser that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: scott farine

customer_reviews.title: Subpar Fence
customer_reviews.text: This is the only miter saw I've ever seen that doesn't have screw holes in the fence. Therefore you are unable to bolt in auxiliary fences which is day one of woodworking. Makes it pretty useless IMO. It would have been so simple for the manufacturer to add bolt holes - and the fact they didn't really just seems like a way of forcing people to pay more money.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: Had a good experice so far. 2 cons. The bag does not do a good job of holding/sucking up shavings. The laser is about 1-2cm off the middle (not sure if it's adjustable).
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lybrink

customer_reviews.title: For $129 a steal
customer_reviews.text: Wow. A $129.00 saw that’s double bevel that’s a double wow factor it’s fairly accurate very light. Great for a job site trim saw
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This done the job I bought it for very well. I also bought a stand for it and it was a great added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: Great little saw. Easy to put into square, more than enough power, and not super heavy. My only complaint is the laser. It's so hard to see that it might as well not even be there.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shiflett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product!!!....This sellers items will make your wildest dreams come true
customer_reviews.author: martin janca

customer_reviews.title: Saw Guard arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The main guard arrived broken in the box, this made the saw unusable and now i can't return it
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year to the day it broke in half. Poor quality casting.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This saw works great for not being your “main line” brand. I have no issues with this saw whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Darwin,36,NY

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this saw, I love it for my small wood working hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Perez-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Trim angles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Miter Saw because l am remodeling my home and the little yellow Miter Box and Saw was not doing a good job on the miter cuts on my window trim, and is a lot of work hand sawing the angles on the trim! Now it is a breeze with my new Miter Saw, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tonika

customer_reviews.title: Great for home projects
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry and set up where you need it. Accurate and works great! Perfect for home projects!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole May Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Saw
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this saw!! As a new woodworker, this saw is wonderful!! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Saw cuts okay but laser doesn't work properly and is of no use to me.
customer_reviews.text: The saw is okay however, the laser does not work properly on it. We changed the batteries and it is still off and of no use to us. That was on of the features why we bought the saw. I am trying to get adjusted to the saw as it handles differently than our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Saw for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Like very light weight Dislike very high RPM’s it has a kick back when pulling the switch. But overall Great price for the Saw.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Delta force
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight, true cutting saw. My only complaint is how loud the saw is when cutting anything. You might want to get some earplugs when using saw.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: The right tool can save you time and money!
customer_reviews.text: The price and quality. We would have spent $600. On house shutters, instead we bought this saw and spent $136.00 on supplies and made beautiful shutters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a starting woodworker/carpenter
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes with these product so far. It’s been very accurate and easy to use while learning woodworking and carpentry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: Love the laser! Shows where you are w/o guessing .
customer_reviews.author: Warren Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Need to return
customer_reviews.text: The fence was bent after receiving it. Need to send back for refund...
customer_reviews.author: jeff smestad

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This saw is great. The cuts are good and the laser on it is adjustable so you can dial it in just right. It's a great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: mr_flea_88

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a five star but the laser guide is powered by separate batteries which I find undesirable
customer_reviews.author: ---mike---

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to have saw dust go in to the bag. What am I doing wrong? It is properly attached
customer_reviews.text: It is a good saw. Powerful & easy to operate. See previous statement
customer_reviews.author: Mike Plyler

product_meta.title: Delta Power Equipment Corporation S26-262L 10" Shop Master Miter Saw with Laser
product_meta.description: Shop Master 10 in. Miter saw with a battery operated laser that makes aligning the blade to the work piece more convenient and precise. It features a Spindle Lock that holds the blade in place during changes. The shop Master 10 in. Miter saw is perfect for the Dyer in the family or for everyday use. It features a powerful 15 amp motor that cuts through wood like butter and spins the 10 in. Blade at 5500 RPM. It has denoted stops at 0, 15, 22.5, 30, and 45 degrees. The battery powered laser ensures an accurate cut every time. It is UL listed and comes with a 3 year warranty. The saw can make Left bevel cuts from 0 to 47 degrees. It works virtually with all Miter saw stands.
feature_bullets: Lightweight unit is easy to move from room to room or even from job to job
Works with virtually all miter saw stands
Spindle lock holds spindle securely while bade nut is loosened and removed
Capacity – cuts Nominal 4x4 and 2x6 at 90° and 2x6 with one pass
Bevels left - from 0°- 47°, cuts Nominal 2x6 at full bevel

specifications.Style: 10-Inch Shop Master Miter Saw with Laser
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
